amendatorysection.catchline: Job training reimbursement grants; recipient; documentation.
amendatorysection.para: An employer receiving a grant shall provide to the Department of Economic Development documentation:
(1) Showing the completion of the eligible job training. The department may require reimbursement of any funds for training not meeting eligibility requirements; and
(2) Showing that the employer has maintained or exceeded its current level of training expenditures in the fiscal year in which the grant was awarded.
